sentences.en: A unanimous vote was taken to liquidate the company.
sentences.cn: 全体投票一致通过停业清理公司。

sentences.en: After discussion their views tended to be unanimous.
sentences.cn: 经过讨论,他们的意见逐渐归于一致.

sentences.en: All decisions of the federal council had to be unanimous.
sentences.cn: 联盟议事会的一切决议,须经全体一致通过.

sentences.en: As opinions vary, no unanimous conclusion can be drawn.
sentences.cn: 众说纷纭, 莫衷一是.

sentences.en: But the unlucky suggestion met with fierce and unanimous opposition.
sentences.cn: 然而这个倒霉的建议遭到了激烈而一致的反对.

sentences.en: Every voice in nature was unanimous in bespeaking change.
sentences.cn: 自然界的各种迹象都在表明要变天了.

sentences.en: He remembered the fact that his nomination had not been unanimous.
sentences.cn: 他想起他被提名并不是一致通过的.

sentences.en: In the end, the decision to scrap the project was unanimous.
sentences.cn: 最后, 大家一致决定放弃这一项目.

sentences.en: It was decided by a unanimous vote that the school should close.
sentences.cn: 关闭学校是大家一致通过的决定。

sentences.en: Reviewers have been almost unanimous in their disparagement of this book.
sentences.cn: 评论家们几乎一致贬抑这本书。

sentences.en: The decision to appoint Matt was almost unanimous.
sentences.cn: 任命马特的决定几乎是一致通过的。

sentences.en: The jury returned a unanimous guilty verdict.
sentences.cn: 陪审团一致作出了有罪裁决。

sentences.en: The ministers had expressed the unanimous view that sanctions should remain in place for the present.
sentences.cn: 大臣们一致认为暂时还不能取消制裁。
他们的决定是全体一致通过的。

sentences.en: Then there was a unanimous call for an explanation.
sentences.cn: 接着大家一致要求汤姆说出原委.

sentences.en: They were unanimous that Chortlesby Manor must be preserved.
sentences.cn: 他们一致认为必须对乔特勒斯比庄园加以保护。

sentences.en: They were unanimous that the report ( should ) be approved.
sentences.cn: 他们一致同意认可那报告.

trans.tran_cn: 全体一致的，一致同意的，无异议的
trans.tran_en: a unanimous decision, vote, agreement etc is one in which all the people involved agree
